title: seen on an obama poster and an interior sign in Jimmy johns…
content:
the x-height is high and there are no curves, only right angles…

author: HANKT

comments.content: [This site](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119081047/http:/gotellmama.org/) seems to be the source of the design. The current poster changes the text and font, but there’s a t-shirt in their store with the design you posted. You could try the contact link at the bottom and see if they’ll tell you what the font is.
